alert.note: Alert for Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 11 at 4:57PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Robeson, north central Dillon and eastern Marlboro Counties through 530 PM EST... At 456 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Raemon, or 10 miles southeast of Laurinburg, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Red Springs, Pembroke, Maxton, St. Pauls, Rowland, Rex, Raemon, Hamer, South Of The Border, Shannon, Buie, Wakulla, Purvis, Prospect, Little Rock, Minturn, Elrod, Parkton, Rennert and Lumber Bridge. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 in South Carolina between mile markers 187 and 192, and between mile markers 195 and 198. Interstate 95 in North Carolina between mile markers 1 and 3, and between mile markers 27 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
